item.title: CVE-2024-1800|2024-03-20T13:11:41.461Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Report Server
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Report Server versions prior to 2024 Q1 (10.0.24.130), a remote code execution attack is possible through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.
